explanation: [0-0] In an empty room, a person wearing pink clothes holds a knife, the tip pointing towards a suspended red balloon.

[0-4] Then the person in pink runs forward and uses the knife to pop seven balloons of different colors, including red, orange, yellow, green, light blue, mauve, light purple, white, and finally a purple balloon.

[0-4] Then the person in pink runs forward and uses the knife to pop seven balloons of different colors, including red, orange, yellow, green, light blue, mauve, light purple, white, and finally a purple balloon.

[0-4] Then the person in pink runs forward and uses the knife to pop seven balloons of different colors, including red, orange, yellow, green, light blue, mauve, light purple, white, and finally a purple balloon.

[0-4] Then the person in pink runs forward and uses the knife to pop seven balloons of different colors, including red, orange, yellow, green, light blue, mauve, light purple, white, and finally a purple balloon.

[4-14] The scene then shifts to a room with a black wall and many blue barrels in front of it. A man in a black short-sleeved shirt and gray patterned shorts appears in the frame, also holding a knife. Behind him is a white wall with a blue cloth hanging on it. In front of the white wall is a cabinet with many items on it. To the left of the man is a black shelf with many balloons hanging on it. The man slowly walks to the left and uses the knife to pierce a light blue balloon and a green balloon, popping them. He then turns to look at the camera, and uses the knife to pierce a yellow balloon, missing. He turns his head to look at the position of the balloon, adjusts the height of the knife, then turns to look at the camera again, and pierces the yellow balloon with the knife. He then checks the position of the red balloon, looks at the camera, pierces the red balloon and the blue balloon in turn, and finally shrugs his shoulders.
